pullRequest.title: Add UserTeleportHomeEvent
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adds an event which allows developers to see & cancel when users attempt to teleport home. This event is needed over UserTeleportEvent due to the fact that it would be extremely difficult to accurately filter it by the /home command.
Closes #3401

nodes.bodyText: The server is already in scope of this method
We can get the server from the user
It may be useful to have the home name relayed in the event as well
Maybe SPAWN instead of RESPAWN, since the player is not really respawning, they are just teleporting to spawn (the location)
